name: mouseDown()
content:
Checks if the mouse button specified is pressed.

Some interactive games use the mouse for the user to control the game.

examples.name: Pencil Drawing

palette_params.name: button
palette_params.description: The mouse button you want to check, either "leftButton" or "rightButton".

short_description: Checks if the mouse button specified is pressed.
tips: - When testing your games that use keyboard or mouse input make sure you click in the display area before you run, otherwise the Workspace will record your keyboard and mouse actions.
